sprache.authkey_info: Your personal web API authorization key which is required for downloading Steam maps. It can be found here here.
sprache.collection_info: Workshop collection ID used for downloading maps. Additional information can be found at here.
sprache.confirm_change: Are you sure you want to save changes?
sprache.delete_server: The following server(s) will be deleted
sprache.error_folder: Error: The user already has this type of server on the specified port.
sprache.error_id: Error: No server could be found.
sprache.error_md: Error: Server could not be changed.
sprache.error_notinstalled: Error: You need to install a master server for this game on the root server.
sprache.error_port: Error: A server with the specified port already exists on that server.
sprache.error_server_install: Error: Could not start the installation on the server.
sprache.error_user: Error: Could not add the user.
sprache.failed: Error: Could not establish a connection to the server.
sprache.gs_add: Add server step 1: user, root server, games
sprache.help_calendar:
You can set server restarts at the top of every hour with our restart planner.
This feature is helpful if you want to switch the game or the template at a given time.
sprache.help_config:
Our web interface allows you to edit the most important config files for your game server. Config files belonging to plugins will be added once they have been installed with the web interface.

If you can't see files then you must edit them via FTP.
sprache.help_md: On this page you can change games at any time. Specifically, our Template feature allows you to maintain multiple game configurations.
sprache.help_list:
This overview lists detailed game server information, for example, the active template, FTP data, etc. The submenus will allow you to do extensive configuration changes.
Games and templates can be defined at Settings. The Server configs area will allow you to manage game and addon settings. If you want to automatically change a game or template, the Restart planner can be useful. Troubleshooting can be done with the Logs.
sprache.help_reinstall:
Resynchronization will add missing files without altering existing ones. This is useful of you've deleted files by accident or new update files are absent.

Reinstall will result in a complete reset. All data will be lost, and the server will be reset to factory defaults.

Both actions are started with the Execute button and usually completed within a few minutes.
sprache.import_destination: Destination server, game and template of import
sprache.import_start: Migration service started. This process may take some time!
sprache.no_server_left: No servers left for this user. Deleting user from the root server.
sprache.server_installed: Successfully started the resynchronization/reinstallation on the server.
sprache.updated: The config has been successfully edited.
sprache.user_add: Successfully added the user on the root server.
